title: Date Night Audio
description:
This week we're talking about perfect dates...if that's even a thing.

Join Our Patreon, beginning August 3, 2020 new bonus episodes will release every Monday!
www.patreon.com/cocktales


Bonnet Chronicles Podcast uploads new episodes every Wednesday!


Medinah has new guided sessions as well as some spicy new sexy stories! Click the link for a FREE 30 DAY TRIAL!
